hero.title: About Syndik
hero.description: We're dedicated to revolutionizing residential syndicate management through innovative technology, exceptional service, and a deep understanding of community needs.

rtlDemo.title: RTL Support Demo
rtlDemo.description: Switch to Arabic to see RTL (Right-to-Left) layout in action.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower residential syndicates with modern, intuitive tools that simplify property management, enhance transparency, and foster stronger community relationships.
mission.details: We understand the unique challenges facing residential syndicates today, from financial transparency to resident communication. That's why we've built a comprehensive platform that addresses these needs with precision and care.

stats.title: Trusted by Communities Worldwide
stats.description: Our platform has helped hundreds of syndicates manage their properties more efficiently.

features.title: Comprehensive Platform Features
features.description: Everything you need to manage your residential syndicate efficiently and effectively.

financialManagement.name: Financial Management
financialManagement.description: Complete financial tracking and reporting for syndicate operations.

residentPortal.description: Easy-to-use portal for residents to stay connected and informed.

meetingManagement.name: Meeting Management
meetingManagement.description: Streamlined tools for organizing and conducting syndicate meetings.

documentStorage.description: Secure cloud storage for all your important syndicate documents.

securityPrivacy.name: Security & Privacy
securityPrivacy.description: Enterprise-grade security with GDPR compliance and data protection.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide everything we do at Syndik.

transparency.name: Transparency
transparency.description: We believe in clear, honest communication and transparent financial management that builds trust within communities.

innovation.name: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously improving our platform with cutting-edge technology and user feedback to stay ahead of industry needs.

community.name: Community
community.description: Building stronger residential communities through better management tools that foster collaboration and engagement.

excellence.name: Excellence
excellence.description: Committed to delivering the highest quality service and support to our users with 24/7 reliability.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.description: From a simple idea to a comprehensive platform serving thousands of residents.

2019.title: Foundation
2019.description: Syndik was founded with a vision to modernize residential property management.

2020.title: First Launch
2020.description: Released our initial platform serving 50+ syndicates across major cities.

2021.title: Mobile App
2021.description: Launched mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.

2022.title: Scale & Growth
2022.description: Expanded to serve 200+ syndicates with enhanced financial modules.

2023.title: AI Integration
2023.description: Introduced AI-powered insights and automated reporting features.

2024.title: Global Expansion
2024.description: Reached 500+ syndicates and launched in multiple international markets.

security.certificationText: We comply with the strictest international standards for security and compliance.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied property managers who trust Syndik.
testimonials.description: Discover how Syndik transforms property management through authentic testimonials from our clients.

reviews.content: Syndik has revolutionized how we manage properties. The intuitive interface and advanced features have saved us precious time.
The platform is excellent for resident management. The self-service portal has significantly improved our customer relations.
The financial and reporting tools are exceptional. We now have complete visibility over our operations.

hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.description: Choose the perfect plan for your syndicate. All plans include our core features with 24/7 support.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.description: Start with our free trial and scale as you grow. No hidden fees, no surprises.

discount.message: Switch to yearly billing and save 20%
discount.yearlyMessage: with yearly billing - that's 2 months free!

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small property managers just getting started.

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Everything you need to manage medium-sized portfolios efficiently.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Advanced features for large-scale property management operations.

allPlansInclude.title: All Plans Include
allPlansInclude.description: Every Syndik plan comes with these essential features to help you manage your syndicate effectively.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial for all our plans. No credit card required to get started.

items.question: Can I change plans later?
items.answer: Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, bank transfers, and can set up custom payment arrangements for enterprise customers.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade security measures including encryption, regular backups, and comply with all data protection regulations.

items.question: Do you offer discounts for annual billing?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 20% discount when you choose annual billing for any of our plans.
